did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: ILR School Contents of the ILR Classroom Wing Cornerstone, 1946- 1961

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations (NYSSILR)

did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Consists of copies of materials apparently placed in the cornerstone of the Classroom Wing of Ives Hall.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of copies of materials apparently placed in the cornerstone of the Classroom Wing of Ives Hall in the year of its construction. Included are ILR and Cornell materials from the year of the School's founding and the year of the wing's construction.

controlaccess.head: Names:
controlaccess.corpname: New York State School of Industrial and Labor Relations

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: ILR School Contents of the ILR Classroom Wing Cornerstone #/4215m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

scopecontent.p: Includes Cornell Daily Sun from May 16, 1961, and ILR brochures and announcements from 1945-1946 and 1960- 1961.
